name: Rollercoaster Dreams
description:
Visit the amusement parks which are created by the players from all over the world. The players from all over the world will visit the amusement parks which are created by you. Rollercoaster Dreams will fulfill these dreams.

★Supports virtual reality
With PlayStation®VR, you can experience as if you are in the world of the game. Enjoy many attractions and thrilling rollercoasters.

★Full-scale management mode
Off course, playing in the amusement parks is not the only feature of the game. The main mode of the game is to manage and grow amusement parks. Show your management skill by development, advertisement, staff management, etc.

★Limitless rollercoasters
The game has the powerful and limitless rollercoaster editor KALMOF. So players can make infinite patterns of rollercoasters.


VR Games may cause some players to experience motion sickness.
